name: Vertical Slice (Sengaya Games)
description:
VERTICAL SLICE is a fast paced Cyberpunk Platformer & Puzzler.

Control and stack falling Tetris Shapes while simultaneously climbing them.

Play Tatsuo, a Samurai Girl living in an experimental City that is completely built by Robots. As the Building Machines go crazy you have to escape the City, but the Deconstruction Void is everywhere and consumes everything in its way. Your only way out is to reach the top of the City or it will be your End.

Controls:

First Semester Project 2019/20 at Games Academy Berlin.

Game Design, Production, Level Design: Philipp Ritschel

Game Design & User Interface: Cedrik Holm

3D & Technical Art: Adam Wankowski

2D Concept, Art & Animation: Caterina Wölfle

Programming: Julian Franz

Music & Sound-Design: Benjamin Feder

Although Production for this Game is finished, feedback is highly appreciated! We still love the idea and are thinking about taking it to the next level.

Mac-Version may encounter a few bugs as it hasn't been tested quite a lot.

Have fun, stay sane ;)
